name: Vance
descriptions: Vance is the leader of a group of "vampires" called the Family in 2277.

When Vance was younger, he decided that life in Rivet City was not for him and began to wander the wasteland. Soon, the ability to find others of his "kind" manifested itself. Over time, he gathered these outcasts and founded their home in Meresti. Using his traits as a basis and wanting to establish some sort of society, he molded the residents into "vampires" and taught them his bloodsucking ways.

He is a fair leader and has never demanded anyone do anything they did not wish to do, nor does he wish to put anyone in harm's way. He sees himself as a leader, but more in the way of a guide or a priest than a king. He addresses the residents of Meresti often so they will never "stray from their true nature," that of the vampire. Vance is not violent and only attacks or orders attacks when survival demands it.

Vance has a very high amount of Hit Points, being significantly tougher than a standard human non-player character. His durability is slightly less than that of a joinable non-player character companion and (with his armor), slightly more than that of a super mutant brute. His weapon of choice is the Shishkebab. Combat with him can be difficult if the player character chooses to deal with the Family violently.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Always a pleasure. What can I do for you?

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you something else.
topics.response_text: Certainly.

topics.topic_text: I've brought some bloodpacks to contribute.
topics.response_text: I can only offer my thanks. My people are getting accustomed to using these as a substitute for live prey.

topics.topic_text: How are things going now?
topics.response_text: Very well, actually. Our truce with Arefu is coming to fruition. I've begun teaching my people to live off of the donated bloodpacks.

topics.topic: MS09FinTLProposalI have a proposal for you from Vance, the Family's leader.
topics.topic_text: Arefu has accepted your proposal, Vance.
topics.response_text: Excellent! I knew you would serve as an ambassador for us in good faith.

topics.topic_text: Can you teach me the ways of the Vampire?
topics.response_text: To be a vampire is a life commitment. It is not achieved by my words, it is something you earn by your own will and sincere meditation.

topics.topic: MS09TLLawsPlease, help me understand your Laws.
topics.topic_text: I think I finally understand what you people are.
topics.response_text: Indeed? Tell me what you've learned from the Laws. What do you think we are?

topics.topic: MS09TLLookingforIanWestI'm looking for Ian West. Have you seen him?
topics.topic_text: Now that I have a better understanding of the Family, may I speak to Ian?
topics.response_text: I had always assumed if a human happened upon our home, it would be for the purpose of our extermination.

topics.topic_text: What is this place?
topics.response_text: You are standing inside Meresti, the home of the Family. This is our sanctuary from the outside world.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Family.
topics.response_text: The Family has become our moniker because that is exactly what we are... related by blood.

topics.topic_text: Arefu donates bloodpacks, and you leave the town alone.
topics.response_text: Agreed. Please, take this proposal to Arefu. Speak with them and then return to me with their decision.

topics.topic_text: Arefu donates bloodpacks, and in exchange, you protect them.
topics.response_text: Agreed. Please, take this proposal to Arefu. Speak with them and then return to me with their decision.

topics.topic_text: Arefu will sell you bloodpacks, and you'll leave the town alone.
topics.response_text: Although I appreciate what you are trying to do, please realize that we have no money or goods to speak of.

topics.topic_text: Ian's decided to leave the Family.
topics.response_text: It saddens me to lose one of my flock, but I believe everyone has to follow their own path.

topics.topic_text: Ian's decided to stay with the Family.
topics.response_text: When you first arrived I was suspicious of your intentions. I can see now it was an error in judgement.

topics.topic_text: Before I talk about Ian, there's still the matter of Arefu to discuss...
topics.response_text: As long as you maintain this level of civility, please proceed.

topics.topic_text: Wait! What about Arefu? You can't just prey on them anytime you're hungry!
topics.response_text: You wish to arrive at some sort of a bargain?

topics.topic_text: How did you know Ian was trying to decide to stay or leave?
topics.response_text: My fine friend, that poor soul has been wrestling with the same question every new member of the Family asks himself when they arrive.

topics.topic_text: How can I convince you to stop preying on Arefu?
topics.response_text: No convincing is necessary. I must say your visit is a pleasant change from what I am accustomed to when dealing with humans.

topics.topic_text: There must be an alternative source of blood you can survive on.
topics.response_text: Many years ago, I survived by drinking from fresh bloodpacks I recovered from hospital ruins.

topics.topic_text: I believe that blood preserved in bloodpacks could provide what you need.
topics.response_text: Many years ago, I survived by drinking from fresh bloodpacks I recovered from hospital ruins.

topics.topic_text: Give those people a chance! They're defenseless.
topics.response_text: I suppose we could stop our raids on Arefu in light of this situation, but that just forces us to prey on others.

topics.topic_text: If you keep attacking Arefu, they'll keep fighting back until everyone is dead.
topics.response_text: Well put. I must say your visit is a pleasant change from what I am accustomed to when dealing with humans.

topics.topic_text: I'm not sure I should be the one telling you this.
topics.response_text: If you fear reprisal from the Family regarding his decision, know that I would never hold it against you.

topics.topic_text: Vampires can drink any kind of human blood... even from bloodpacks.
topics.response_text: Curious. Many years ago, I survived by drinking from fresh bloodpacks I recovered from hospital ruins.

topics.topic_text: This place is very different from any of the other settlements I've seen.
topics.response_text: What you see before you is the last bastion of hope for the downtrodden and misunderstood.

topics.topic_text: What is this place?
topics.response_text: What you see before you is the last bastion of hope for the downtrodden and misunderstood.

topics.topic_text: I think I've stumbled across the world's first underground insane asylum!
topics.response_text: Your words echo the very reason this place was established.

topics.topic_text: <Allow Vance to continue.>
topics.response_text: We are the remnants of society, cast aside like the clean-picked bones of a hunter's feast.

topics.topic_text: Excuse me, but what does all that mean?
topics.response_text: What does it mean? Allow me to simplify it for you since you are obviously of limited intellect.

topics.topic_text: Whoa, whoa... slow down there. I left my thesaurus at home.
topics.response_text: What does it mean? Allow me to simplify it for you since you are obviously of limited intellect.

topics.topic_text: Your ways? So you're reforming these people?
topics.response_text: Ah! Your words illustrate why the hardships persist for my people. Reforming implies something is wrong with them and needs to be eliminated.

topics.topic_text: What do you mean?
topics.response_text: Humans call for our extermination or reform. Reforming implies something is wrong with us and needs to be eliminated.

topics.topic_text: Wow, you're a real humanitarian.
topics.response_text: I find your choice of words quite droll, but that is what I have come to expect from your kind.

topics.topic_text: If I accept that you're no longer cannibals, what do I call you?
topics.response_text: Your open mindedness is very rare for a human. I find that fascinating.

topics.topic_text: Your people eat human flesh, Vance. That's sick!
topics.response_text: That is correct my arrogant friend, but you are missing the grand picture I'm afraid.

topics.topic_text: A cannibal by any other name is still a cannibal.
topics.response_text: That is completely untrue. Your difficulty grasping the concept that change is possible in my people perplexes me. Let me try a different approach.

topics.topic_text: Enough talk! I'm here to wipe your kind out!
topics.response_text: I would choose your next words VERY carefully if I were in your place.

topics.topic_text: None of this talk is necessary. I know exactly what you are.
topics.response_text: You amaze me. Never have I met a human with the gift of cognition that you possess.

topics.topic_text: This isn't rocket science. I know exactly what you are.
topics.response_text: You amaze me. Never have I met a human with the gift of cognition that you possess.

topics.topic_text: I have a letter for him. From his sister...
topics.response_text: Then a part of his human family still remains? Even more of a reason he needs to remain in isolation.

topics.topic_text: Ian shouldn't be here. He has family that misses him.
topics.response_text: WE are his family. If he were to leave, how can you be certain he would not feel the same way about us?

topics.topic_text: You people murdered his parents!
topics.response_text: Murder is a very strong word, my friend. Do you consider it murder when a hunter stalks his prey in order to put food on the table?

topics.topic_text: I don't have time for chit-chat. Tell me where Ian is. Now!
topics.response_text: Sigh. Short temper. So typical of a human.

topics.topic_text: Wait a minute... What happened to him?
topics.response_text: Ian's hunger for flesh overwhelmed him... it drove him to kill his parents.

topics.topic_text: Damn it, Vance! What did you do to him?
topics.response_text: Do to him? Nothing. Ian's hunger for flesh overwhelmed him... it drove him to kill his parents.

topics.topic_text: Are you telling me that Ian is a cannibal?
topics.response_text: I am telling you he will no longer be labeled as such. He has become one of us... a member of the Family.

topics.topic_text: I find this all very hard to believe.
topics.response_text: The hunger that drives us must be kept in check. It is one of the most difficult things to teach.

topics.topic_text: This letter is all Ian has left of his old life. Allow me to give it to him.
topics.response_text: Your words impress me, human. Perhaps I misjudged you when we first met.

topics.topic_text: Look, I'm one of you. So I understand your feelings. I just want to talk to Ian.
topics.response_text: Indeed. Perhaps my sense of caring for Ian has overwhelmed my sense of duty to the Family and all others like us.

topics.topic_text: Please, you must let me speak to him!
topics.response_text: No, it would not be right to disturb him in this time of meditation. I am sorry but I cannot allow it.

topics.topic_text: Let me see Ian, you filthy liar!
topics.response_text: I can sympathize with your anger, human. Many find cannibalism shocking, especially in the young.

topics.topic_text: You're vampires. Or at least you follow their fictional traditions.
topics.response_text: Do you think I believe I can turn into a bat and fly away? Of course not. Do I cast my image in a mirror? Absolutely.

topics.topic_text: If I said vampires, and you said I was right, we'd both be crazy.
topics.response_text: Do you think I believe I can turn into a bat and fly away? Of course not. Do I cast my image in a mirror? Absolutely.

topics.topic_text: I still say you're cannibals.
topics.response_text: It saddens me to think that your failure to understand us could be my fault. If that is the case, allow me to enlighten you.

topics.topic_text: I think you're a collective of seriously messed up freaks.
topics.response_text: I can see that you have no understanding of what I have accomplished here.

topics.topic_text: You do this by teaching them that they're mythical beings?
topics.response_text: Now you disappoint me. You need to open your mind and think for a moment before you pass judgment.

topics.topic_text: What you're doing here is brainwashing them, plain and simple.
topics.response_text: Yes. In a way, I am brainwashing them. I am eliminating their fears, their inhibitions and their shame.

topics.topic_text: Come on, Vance! You're on a power trip... you mess with their minds!
topics.response_text: Yes. In a way, I am brainwashing them. I am eliminating their fears, their inhibitions and their shame.

topics.topic_text: I have no idea.
topics.response_text: Then that is a mystery you will have to solve on your own.

topics.topic_text: I don't have time for games, Vance.
topics.response_text: That is where you are mistaken, my friend. Time is a commodity more abundant than any other in this world.

topics.topic_text: I think you're a bunch of creepy weirdos.
topics.response_text: Names like that have no meaning here... your insults are a wasted effort.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: I am afraid that the knowledge required to appreciate our true nature is far above your level of comprehension.

conversation.response_text: Come back to us anytime. The Family considers you a friend.
I will make this as clear as possible, Karl. Never again. You disobey my laws once more and you will be out of Meresti for good!
That is not how the Family operates, and you know it! Now do not test my patience on this subject.
We are the Family and together we will stand united!
